DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not infection was present on radiologic findings.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce._Imaging results obtained through a radiology procedure._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
